message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product. We're excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, we're willing to offer you the product for $1100000. We believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After re-evaluating our pricing strategy, we're willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $1050000. We believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I understand your position, but given my financial situation, I am unable to go above $975000 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your considerations.
